Description:
Opportunity + Potential = Prosperous Possibilities . .
ON The Market
Virtual inspections & Private inspections available on request, contact Jess to book in a time.
Roncon Real Estate presents an enticing and engaging opportunity that is sure to excite investors, developers and first home buyers alike. This character home is set on an abundant 737m2 of land and is located in a quiet street of the increasingly popular, Whittington.
The home includes two bedrooms with built in robes, a spacious and functional living / dining zone with timber flooring flowing throughout. The central bathroom comprises bath, shower and single vanity. The well-designed kitchen has an abundance of storage with a lovely leafy backyard outlook. All of this, plus a vast rear yard coupled with an undercover outdoor entertaining area, garage and lush leafy vegetation is sure to surprise and delight!
Fully featured with gas heating plus split system heating and cooling.
This pocket of Whittington is private, family friendly and conveniently positioned within walking distance to shopping centres, local schools, Gordon Institute of TAFE East Geelong Campus, a short 10-minute drive to Central Geelong and within easy access to all that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
Potential to extend, subdivide, demolish and redevelop the entire site (STCA), the opportunity is here now. With all the potential and possibilities, this home wont last long.
Roncon Real Estate Always ON!

Description:
First Home Owner with entertainment in mind..
This immaculately presented 3 bedroom, home situated on an even better size piece of land of approximately 799mn2. As soon as you walk in you are meet with how immaculate this home is, as all you will have to do is move straight in and relax and enjoy all the hard work that has been done for you. 3 bedrooms , master and second with built in robes. updated / modernized family bathroom. Sunken open plan kitchen/ dining/ living area, kitchen consisting of gas cooktop / electric oven/ dishwasher and plenty of bench space and the ideal butlers pantry. The open living area with woodfire heating & split system air conditioning with access to large decked outdoor entertaining area complete with child proof 8 person spa for year round entertaining. Add to this double lockup garage , undercover area for the caravan, boat or for the tradies trailer to be secure. All this as mentioned on 799m2 and all within walking distance to shopping centres, primary & secondary schools, public transport, Gordon Tafe, Geelong CBD & South Geelong Train Station only 5 mins away. A must inspection.

Description:
Great First Home/Investment or Tradesman's Paraside
Here is a substantial brick veneer family home set on a corner block of 838m2 approx and is ideally located close to shopping centres, schools and public transport. Consisting of 3 good size bedrooms plus study or 4th bedroom. A generous lounge/dining room, central kitchen, with adjacent living/meals area offering plenty of room for the family. Outside is a very large double garage with a rumpus room attached, ideal as a teenager retreat. There is also room down the side for a caravan or boat and plenty of OSP. The Alfresco area is ideal for entertaining when family and friends come over, with still plenty of backyard for children and pets to enjoy. This one is ready to add to your investment portfolio or just move in and call home. Interested? Don't hesitate, call today!

Description:
Quality Living in an Ideal Location
This immaculate fully renovated home set on a generous allotment of approx 651m2, is perfect for the young family, first home buyers, downsizers or investors.
The property has been renovated entirely comprising of new floor coverings, new kitchen and freshly painted throughout to say the least. There is nothing more to do.
With three good sized bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite .Two further bedrooms with built in robes with easy access to the family bathroom incorporating a bath, shower and separate toilet.
As you enter the home you are greeted with a large lounge that flows onto the spacious dining area, adjoining the kitchen.
Boasting quality Delongi S/S appliances and an abundance of bench space, the kitchen ties in perfectly with the family living and study nook, that lead out to the undercover alfresco area with north facing low maintenance garden.
The laundry is faultless providing plenty of storage.
With an abundance of natural light throughout, quality window furnishings, gas heating and split system along with SLUG with rear roller door and additional off street parking for caravan/trailer or car, complete this gorgeous home.
• Gas heating
• Split system
• North facing backyard
• Close to schools, shopping & CBD
• Rent approx. $420 pw
• Parking for Boat/Caravan and extra car
• 651m2
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Loads of space inside and out
Set on 375m2 block, this two bedroom home is the perfect low fuss investment, first home or a brilliant downsizer opportunity. Separately titled, and currently rented the home offers a huge open plan living and meals area with the kitchen adjacent. The updated kitchen features gas stove, electric wall oven, island bench and dishwasher while both bedrooms offer built in robes. The bathroom is spacious with a large vanity and wall to wall shower. There is an abundance of storage inside with a walk in linen cupboard and second lined cupboard and the oversized single garage with remote roller door offers space for a workshop. A large paved backyard has off street access and enough room to store a boat and caravan together. Additional features include gas heating and split system air conditioning in the lounge, ceiling fan and second split system air conditioner in the master bedroom for year round comfort and electric external shutters at the front of the property for additional privacy. Conveniently located close to transport, schools and local shops,don't miss out on this versatile property.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Hidden gem.
Fantastic opportunity to purchase this impressive and comfortable 2 bedroom unit ideal for the first home buyer, astute investor or the perfect downsizer. You will be impressed with the spacious room sizes as you enter into the comfortable lounge room, complete with gas wall heating and split system heating and cooling for year round comfort. The large kitchen with plenty of cupboards and bench space looks over the meals and lounge areas. Complete with 2 very generous sized bedrooms (both with built in robes), large central bathroom and a good sized laundry. A secluded rear court yard and a high fenced front gate gives the home a feeling of privacy and serenity. Complete with a single car garage and garden shed for additional storage space and plenty of garden area for the avid garderner. Located within walking distance to local shops and public transport and within minutes from Newcomb and Bellarine Shopping Centres, Eastern Gardens, Geelong Waterfront and CBD.

Description:
Something a little bit different.
Also known as 1 Vostok Court, this property is something different for you.
As you enter the home you will be impressed with the large lounge room with cathedral ceilings, gas log fire and brick work feature, complete with split system heating and cooling & ceiling fan for year round comfort. Adjoining meals area and functional kitchen with pantry and upright electric stove and cook top. 3 bedrooms, all with built in robes, central bathroom & laundry and good sized secure back yard for the kids to play or the pets to roam. The bonus of having a good sized double garage with work shop measuring 6m x 7.2m and all this located on a corner allotment of some 567m2 (approx.). With easy access to public transport and close to public primary and secondary schools, shopping centres at Newcomb Central and Bellarine Village, Splash Down aquatic centre, sporting facilities and only 10 minutes to Geelong CBD and waterfront. Get in quick for a good start for your first home or to add to your property portfolio.

Description:
One For Big Families
Located in a quiet court location & set on a great allotment of approx 575sqm right next to a large reserve offering the kids plenty of room to play, is this immaculate family home that offers a surprising amount of space!
Presenting a large master retreat, with robe & ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with BIRs) a conveniently located family bathroom, spacious front lounge & large dining area. The kitchen overlooks the informal family room which leads directly outside to the expansive undercover entertaining with cafe blinds allowing year round use. Two gas wall heaters, split system cooling and a double tandem carport complete this impressive package.
This home is immediately comfortable and would suit a family looking for that extra space that is so hard to find at an affordable price or a great addition to any investment portfolio with an approx return of $360pw.

Description:
Neat, nothing to do, ready to go!
This lovely 1 bedroom unit is an ideal investment, downsizer or entry level property for a first home buyer. Featuring an open plan kitchen dinette and good sized lounge. The bedroom has an ensuite and BIR. The laundry features cupboard space and a trough. At the rear is an attractive courtyard with synthetic turf for low maintenance care. Completing this fantastic package is a single car carport. Currently tenanted and returning $230 per week. Only moments from the Newcomb Shopping Centre and with easy access to the city and Bellarine it has plenty of appeal and won't last. Be quick to inspect!

Description:
Position Potential Perfect..!
Surrounded by established homes and positioned in a peaceful pocket this land creates the perfect opportunity for a first home buyer to take full advantage of the first homeowners grant or makes an ideal canvas for a purchaser to build a home that more suits their downsizing needs.
Set over approximately 316m2 and with all connections in place this land is ready to go. For those that want to hit the ground running you could utilise the council approved plans for a double storey three bedroom | two bathroom | single garage home that complement the land dimensions.
Centrally located to take full advantage of all the nearby local amenities and within easy walking distance to primary schools, secondary schools, the local library, day care centre, medical facilities and a short drive to Central Geelong - and bus stops a stones throw away. This location delivers all your needs at your fingertips.
Dont miss this great opportunity to enter into Geelongs ever growing and popular real estate market!
Roncon Real Estate An Agency like no other!

Description:
Family Living At Its Finest
Living the fine life in this distinguished family home is more affordable than you would think, this is a property you will truly want to call your own. This gorgeous family home is set right in the heart of Whittington, boasting a beautiful sense of style and comfort like no other.
Featuring large light filled spaces, quality floors front to back and a flexible floor plan including four large bedrooms that all include built in robes (main offering a large walk in robe). Two family bathrooms ideally positioned at either end of the property, a generous size laundry with ample storage and bench space and a separate toilet.
A galley style kitchen includes modern finishes, tiled splash-back, gas cooktop stove and ample cupboard space while adjacent is the dining area and a very spacious living room that overlooks the garden space.
Quality fixtures and fittings throughout this home are complimented with sophistication creating modern lifestyle, combined with indoor/outdoor entertaining perfect for all seasons. Ample secure off-street parking and a back yard for growing little football stars!
All comprised on a large sun soaked 556m2 (approx.) allotment accompanied by low-maintenance gardens offering you heaps of privacy. Set in one of Whittingtons most established streets with a potential rental return of $300-$320pw, this home boasts easy access to the primary & secondary schools, Newcomb Central Shopping Centre, easy access to the surf coast and the Geelong Ring Road Simply move in and enjoy!
Insights: 227 Wilsons Road, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2020 and 6 other 4 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
SAVVY INVESTMENT OR IDEAL FIRST HOME
This nearly new, one owner 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom, SLUG modern townhouse in growing Whittington complex would make an ideal first home, fantastic downsizer being low maintenance or a savvy investment with a potential a rent of $300 pw.
Comprising of 6 in the block, and being a stones throw from Newcomb shopping centre, this modern townhouse offers 2 good sized bedrooms, both with electric plug in heater, brand new carpet, BIR and block out blinds.
The central bathroom is modern and offers a corner shower with frameless glass doors, floating vanity, LED downlights and modern toilet.
The spacious open plan living/dining and kitchen area is tastefully finished with new carpet, block-out blinds and a split system unit for all year round comfort, while two sets of sliding doors provide access to the private courtyard.
The kitchen is equipped SS appliances, electric oven, four burner gas cooktop and dishwasher.
This wonderfully presented townhouse is ideally located in growing Whittington, 10 minutes walk to Newcomb shopping centre, close to schools and parks, less than 5 minutes drive to East Geelong café precinct and 20 minutes to the Bellarine coast.
FEATURES
Body Corp $460 per quarter
Established Complex Gardens
Powered SLUG
Water Tank
Brand new Carpet
Heat/Cool

Description:
Everything done in a Central location
Phone enquiry code for this property : 5314
**Sale by Set date**
$455,000 to $475,000
Offers accepted until 30/5/2019
This family home situated in a quiet street on a large allotment is sure to impress. It's ready to go now and would suit a young family, a downsizing purchaser or the avid Gardener. The home is Pet friendly with secure fencing and everything is done. Just move in and start living.
The split level living off the main entry hall, leads to the 3 bedrooms, 2 of which have BIR's, on the upper level. A separate toilet and bathroom at the rear, complete this side of the home.
The lower level is sure to impress, filled with natural light & warmth. A generous sized lounge with a Cathedral celing, is heated with either a wood heater or reverse cycle heating and cooling and has plenty of space to relax.
In the light filled modern Kitchen, there are adequate cooking options for entertaining, including a large 90cm electric oven & Range-hood, a natural gas 4 burner cook-top, dish-draw, 1 1/2 s/steel sink, plenty of bench space and ample cupboard storage. A good sized Laundry behind the Kitchen has ample storage & bench space for the work needed that leads onto the deck.
The Family room adjoins the Kitchen and also provides entry to the decked pergola entertainment area, via a sliding door.
The home is freshly painted inside and out & has all new carpet throughout. It has new gutters & downpipes meaning the long-term maintenance is complete.
The home has window locks and security door and a closed circuit camera system that provides piece of mind with remote viewing enabled.
Outside, a long driveway provides parking for 3-4 cars. This leads to the single car Garage with a good sized workshop towards the rear of the yard, where a sizeable wood shed, seed-raising Hot-house, Vegetable gardens & Chicken Coup are situated. This is every gardeners dream.
The Family can Entertain in the spacious shady backyard in the warmer months, under the spectacular Gleditsia or on the long decked Pergola and cook in the separate protected BBQ area.
Your new purchase is situated 1 minute walk to the newly furbished adventure playground facility, and is located between several bus stops. This home is only minutes drive to the city & centrally located between each coast for weekend escapes.
The services nearby include 3 Childcare centres, 3 Kindergartens, 3 Primary Schools, Newcomb Secondary College, The Gordon Tafe East Geelong Campus, Bellarine Village, Newcomb Central Shopping Centre, Newcomb Library, Splashdown, Doctors, Specialists, The Geelong Racecourse & Showgrounds.
This home won't last long on the market so is a must to inspect.
Open times are listed or to arrange a time that suits you, make contact following the details provided soon.
Phone enquiry code for this property : 5314

Description:
Unbeatable Value On A Massive Block!
This is the rarest of all opportunities; a beautifully presented and delightfully updated 4 bedroom brick home set on app. 801 square metres at a very affordable price!
Spotless from front to back the home is comprised of a bright and inviting L shaped living area that greets you on entry, functional kitchen with slate floors, dishwasher, gas hotplates, electric oven, range hood and plenty of cupboard and bench space and an open dining area that leads out to a sensational all year round undercover outdoor entertainment area. All 4 bedrooms are fitted with built in robes, ceiling fans, double blinds and wall to wall carpet while the master bedroom also has a reverse cycle heating and cooling unit and direct access to the tastefully updated 2 way bathroom with separate bath and shower, high quality tiling, fixtures and fittings and basin.
Notable extras include wood heater and air conditioner in the lounge, upright gas heater and fan in dining and kitchen area, downlights and wall to wall carpet right throughout the home, tiled laundry and extra shedding in the spacious rear yard.
Theres ample car accommodation available with a long driveway leading down to a tandem car lock up garage with workshop space and for those that require public transport theres bus routes nearby that will take you to all that Geelong has to offer in only minutes. There are schools, 2 shopping centres, Splashdown and sporting facilities all within a short distance and once youre on the Bellarine Highway there is a world of fun available with wineries, Adventure Park and Daniels donuts in Portarlington all a nice Sunday drive away.
With a fantastic tenant locked in at $360 per week until the end of April 2020 this outstanding home is not just for the first home buyers, growing families or retirees searching for space to park the boat, van or trailer but presents as a genuine long term investment opportunity for the astute purchaser and with Whittington tipped to be the next boom suburb in Geelong this may well be your last chance to get into the market at this level!.
Insights: 4 Galaxy Court, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2020 and 6 other 4 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Exceptional Value! Ideal First Home or Investment Opportunity!
This fantastic brick home sitting on a 552sqm (approx.) corner allotment is well suited to a range of purchasers, from first home buyer, renovators or investors alike.
The property itself offers three comfortable sized bedrooms, 2 with built in robes and ceiling fans, a central bathroom with separate toilet and plenty of storage space throughout the home. The open plan kitchen and dining area provides lots of bench and cupboard space and includes a gas stovetop and electric oven. Adjacent to the kitchen is a light filled lounge room perfect for entertaining friends or family with a coonara wood fireplace.
Step outside to the rear of the home and you are greeted by a large low maintenance backyard complete with undercover entertaining area and off-street parking space. With an additional separate outdoor bungalow that has 2 rooms, a kitchenette, bathroom with toilet and shower there are many options with this additional space.
Minutes from local schools, Newcomb Shopping Village, Splashdown Aquatic Centre and Geelong CBD this property is a great investment which is sure to bring a solid return. Don't miss your chance to inspect today. With an expected rental return of $300 - $320pw this is a solid investment property.

Don't judge a book by its cover.
Talk about don't judge a book by its cover. This updated 3 bedroom home will impress from the minute you walk in the front door. This updated home has a sleek kitchen with a 900mm stainless steel oven with gas hotplates, range hood, double sink and plenty of bench and cupboard space that will impress the cook of the family. Relax in the family room with split system heating and cooling and ceiling fan for all year round comfort while looking out into the good sized rear yard. 3 bedrooms (all with built in robes), central bathroom and laundry, covered entertaining area or carport and a huge back yard for the kids to play in or the pets to roam. Located on a large corner allotment of 609m2(approx.) with public transport at your doorstep and close to public primary and secondary schools, shopping centres at Newcomb Central and Bellarine Village, Splash Down aquatic centre, sporting facilities and only 10 minutes to Geelong CBD and Waterfront.

Description:
SMART INVESTMENT OR FIRST HOME SET IN CONVENIENT LOCATION
Nestled in a quiet pocket on the outskirts of Whittington with St Albans Park nearby is this neat, detached 2-bedroom unit of 5 ideal for an investor, first home buyer or downsizer.
Comprising of off-street parking to a single lock up garage, 2 good sized bedrooms with built in robes, open plan living and kitchen area containing air conditioning and gas heating. The laundry leads you to a low maintenance garden where it opens up to the side of the house. Within proximity to schools, shopping centre, sporting facilities and public transport, all within a short drive to the CBD. A great rental opportunity of approximately $280-$310 per week.
FEATURES
Single lock up garage
Kelvinator cooling
Vulcan heating
Rent: $280-$310pw approx

Description:
1012m2 Reasons to Buy.
This perfectly located home, set on an approximate 1012m2 allotment and offering many possibilities for either the first homeowner, investor, or developer to consider. Original 3 bedroom home all with built-in robes which includes polished hardwood floorboards throughout, light-filled front lounge / living area along with functional kitchen / dining area. Central family bathroom, gas heating, AC cooling, single lock-up garage as well as out the back is bungalow / teenagers' retreat. Add to this the huge opportunity to subdivide which is all subject to council approval (STCA). As youll be investing in your future and into an exceptional pocket of Whittington that is primed for growth. Situated within proximity to all amenities including public transport, Bellarine Village shopping centre, Newcomb Central Shopping Centre, Botanical Gardens, Waterfront, and only 5kms to Geelong CBD. This is an opportunity not to be missed, call today to enquire.

Description:
Calling All First Home Buyers and Investors.
With easy access to the CBD, local shops, schools and public transport this location is sure to appeal. Perfect for those wanting to enter the real estate market or an addition to your rental portfolio do not miss this opportunity. Rent approx $350pw. Further develop STCA.
Three bedrooms, all with BIRs are complimented by a neat updated bathroom with shower, bath and separate toilet.
The lounge room flows through to the kitchen/dining area. The new kitchen with S/S appliances, plenty of bench space/storage and dishwasher is ideal. Heating and cooling is accounted for with a split systems and ceiling fans.
Comprising of DLUG with further off street parking for 3 cars.
Minutes from local schools, Newcomb Shopping Centre, Splashdown Aquatic Centre and Geelong CBD. This is an easy investment to enter Geelong's growing market.

Description:
QUALITY STARTER OR INVESTMENT
Perfectly positioned close to Newcomb Shopping Village and with easy access to the Geelong CBD, this solid 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom brick home has so much to offer. Sitting on a 510m2 block, first home owners and investors alike are sure to be delighted.
The master bedroom features a walk through robe with direct access to the two way central bathroom, while the remaining two bedrooms both have built in robes.
With reverse cycle heating and cooling, along with Vulcan heating and a ceiling fan, the L-Shaped lounge with as new carpet offers year round comfort.
The neat kitchen includes a gas cooktop and gas wall oven, and the meals area features a glass sliding door that opens onto the large undercover outdoor pergola.
This lovingly cared for home boasts an immaculately maintained rear garden and double lock up garage.
This home will not stay on the market for long, so do not miss your opportunity to add to your rental portfolio or enter the real estate market. Call today for further information.
